question:
Consider the following statements about the SAATHI (Sustainable and Accelerated Adoption of efficient Textile technologies to Help small Industries) initiative:
  1. It is an initiative under Ministry of Power
  2. It is being jointly implemented by Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL) and the office of the Textile Commissioner on a pan-India basis
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: SAATHI stands for Sustainable and Accelerated Adoption of Efficient Textile Technologies (SAATHI). It is an initiative taken by the power sector to boost energy-efficient Powerlooms in the country. Recently, Ministries of Power and Textiles have joined hands under a new initiative SAATHI to promote and boost small and medium Powerloom units in the country. It will be jointly implemented by EESL and the office of the Textile Commissioner on a pan-India basis. Further, to kick start the implementation, cluster wise demonstration projects and workshops will be organized in key clusters such as Erode, Surat, Ichalkaranji, etc.
